alert.note: Alert for Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN NESS...EASTERN TREGO...NORTHWESTERN RUSH AND ELLIS COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM CDT... At 541 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of Ogallah to near Ransom. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ogallah, Riga, and Cedar Bluff around 545 PM CDT. Ellis around 555 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and west central Kansas.
